title: Amsterdam Cops: Collected Stories
description: For those who love Grijpstra and de Gier series set in Amsterdam, as well as newcomers, Amsterdam Cops brings together an enjoyable collection of short stories featuring the commissaris and their colleagues on the police force. These lively stories span two decades and a great deal of ups and downs in the lives of Grijpstra and de Gier.
author: Janwillem van de Wetering
